desc: Rose Decorative Interiors | Browse stylish and sophisticated decorative, salvaged interior and exterior vintage furniture and homeware for home and garden. Specialising in salvaged furniture, textiles, ceramics, wrought iron and cast iron items. Based in Wexford, Ireland. Carol Allen Kelly

layout.text: WE SPECIALISE IN SOURCING SALVAGED ANTIQUE FURNITURE, UNIQUE DECORATIVE PIECES & VINTAGE ITEMS FOR HOME INTERIORS OR GARDENS.
